name: Corrosive Haze
desc: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

name: Penitence
desc: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

name: Hex
desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

name: Frost Arrows
desc: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.

name: Heartpiercer
desc: Pangolier reads his enemies perfectly, deftly slipping his blade past defenses. Each attack has a chance to negate enemy armor and slow the target for a duration, activating after a short delay.

name: Shield Crash
desc: Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground, damaging all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.\n\nForward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.

name: Storm Hammer
desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

name: Aftershock
desc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

name: Flak Cannon
desc: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

name: Pulse Nova
desc: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.
